info.title: OpenDota Parser API
info.description: HTTP interface for parsing Dota 2 replays and managing replay ingestion workflows.

post.description: Streams a replay payload to the parser for processing. The parser returns the aggregated JSON payload generated by downstream processors.

200.description: Parsing succeeded. Returns JSON emitted by downstream processors.

500.description: Parsing failed or replay payload invalid.

get.description: Returns `ok` when the parser process is healthy.
Downloads a replay from a remote location (S3 or HTTP), streams it through the parser, and returns the parsed output.

parameters.name: replay_url
parameters.description: URL to the replay blob. Supports HTTP(S) and S3 URIs.

200.description: Parsing succeeded, response body contains parsed output.

500.description: Remote replay download or parsing failed.

get.description: Reads a replay from the local filesystem, streams it through the parser, and returns the parsed output.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Absolute path to the replay file accessible by the parser process.

200.description: Parsing succeeded, response body contains parsed output.

403.description: Replay exists but the parser cannot read it.
